variations.description: Generates 2 Chaos Energy, heals all allies for 144% of Goorveig's ATK, and deals Magic DMG equal to 180% of Goorveig's ATK to all enemies.
Generates 2 Chaos Energy, heals all allies for 168% of Goorveig's ATK, and deals Magic DMG equal to 210% of Goorveig's ATK to all enemies.
Generates 2 Chaos Energy, heals all allies for 192% of Goorveig's ATK, and deals Magic DMG equal to 240% of Goorveig's ATK to all enemies.
Generates 2 Chaos Energy, heals all allies for 216% of Goorveig's ATK, and deals Magic DMG equal to 270% of Goorveig's ATK to all enemies.
Generates 2 Chaos Energy, heals all allies for 240% of Goorveig's ATK, and deals Magic DMG equal to 300% of Goorveig's ATK to all enemies.

Transforms into a Creature of the Abyss, dealing Magic DMG equal to 120% of ATK to all enemies and increasing their Magic DMG taken by 24% for 10s (Creature of the Abyss inherits 130% of Goorveig's max Health and ATK, and heals all allies for 100% of Goorveig's ATK when casting Energy Sword).

Transforms into a Creature of the Abyss, dealing Magic DMG equal to 140% of ATK to all enemies and increasing their Magic DMG taken by 28% for 10s (Creature of the Abyss inherits 135% of Goorveig's max Health and ATK, and heals all allies for 100% of Goorveig's ATK when casting Energy Sword).

Transforms into a Creature of the Abyss, dealing Magic DMG equal to 160% of ATK to all enemies and increasing their Magic DMG taken by 32% for 10s (Creature of the Abyss inherits 140% of Goorveig's max Health and ATK, and heals all allies for 100% of Goorveig's ATK when casting Energy Sword).

Transforms into a Creature of the Abyss, dealing Magic DMG equal to 180% of ATK to all enemies and increasing their Magic DMG taken by 36% for 10s (Creature of the Abyss inherits 145% of Goorveig's max Health and ATK, and heals all allies for 100% of Goorveig's ATK when casting Energy Sword).

Transforms into a Creature of the Abyss, dealing Magic DMG equal to 200% of ATK to all enemies and increasing their Magic DMG taken by 40% for 10s (Creature of the Abyss inherits 150% of Goorveig's max Health and ATK, and heals all allies for 100% of Goorveig's ATK when casting Energy Sword).
Increases the max Health and ATK of Creature of the Abyss by 15% each.
Increases the max Health and ATK of Creature of the Abyss by 30% each.
